a1: Comma (,), semicolon (;), tab, and pipe (|) delimiters are all supported. Choose the one matching your data format.
q2: Can I add or remove rows?
a2: Yes, in edit mode you can add new rows and columns, and delete rows using the delete button.
q3: How does it handle quoted fields?
a3: The parser correctly handles double-quoted fields, including fields containing commas and escaped quotes within values.
